 [‹ Casual Script ID needed...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011044129/http:/typophile.com/node/17934 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Portfolio 2006" straight-sided tech sans - ITC Conduit {Dav} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011044129/http:/typophile.com/node/17938 "Go to next forum topic")
author: planet_embroidery

comments.content: There are plenty more boring fonts than this one! It’s just overused is all.
Yes, boring is in the eye of the beholder.
My opinion is not an expert one (like some of the posters here no doubt) but I have to admit to being repulsed by this one. Maybe its got bad feng sui.

Actually it surprises and comforts me that you find DIN boring. Most art directors get a hard-on over this kind of aseptic tech sans faces, and it amounts to a lot of safe but ultimately bland “high design”. :^)
